title: ranked 3v3s?
body: Hey, everyone so me and a couple buddies recently created a ranked team for 3s and even as a team no que for ranked 3s even shows up. does anyone know why?

replies.body:
Ranked Teams are currently on a schedule, and include both 5v5 and 3v3 matches. The [Ranked Team Schedule](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209964886-Ranked-Teams-Schedule) provides timeframes for each region as well as weekdays and weekends.

NA Weekday: 16:00 - 22:00 PDT
(6 hours)

NA Weekend: 14:00 - 22:00 PDT
(8 hours)
oh I see thank you a ton, makes sense why i could do it later on yesterday.
